compiler

Class Number

  • java.lang.Object
    • compiler.Node
      • compiler.Number

  •  class Number
extends Node
    Concrete numeric literal nodes. Equality for these nodes is defined consistent with common subexpression value. Numbers with the same string representation or numeric value are equal.

    • Field Summary
